faq.title: Have questions? We’re ready to help
faq.description: Find quick answers about our TOEIC learning platform.

items.question: Is the Placement Test free?
items.answer: Yes. Take the Placement Test for free to understand your current level.

items.question: How many times can I take the Placement Test?
items.answer: You can take it once to get your initial roadmap. If you need another attempt later, contact support.

items.question: How is the roadmap personalized?
items.answer: We analyze strengths and weaknesses from your Placement Test and recommend Parts/Levels that match your ability.

items.question: What makes Premium different from Free?
items.answer: Premium unlocks unlimited practice, full test explanations, AI/Admin chat, file downloads, deeper analytics, and priority support.

items.question: Can I cancel Premium anytime?
items.answer: Yes. Cancel whenever you want and keep Premium access until the billing cycle ends.

items.question: Is the platform available in English?
items.answer: The interface is optimized for Vietnamese learners, but all tests and questions stay in English like the real TOEIC.
